title: Bug 27977drag drop threshold region not calculated properly
description: Bug 27977drag drop threshold region not calculated properly It can be fixed by adding the followingline to org/eclipse/swt/widgets/Control.java:3397. (I've tested this and itworks for me. )OS.ClientToScreen(handle, pt);
OB: The Windows implementation of SWT does not correctly identify the thresholdregion (i.e., the area surrounding the mouse cursor outside of which movementshould be regarded as the initiation of a drag and drop operation).
EB: This isbecause the threshold detection code expects screen coordinates while themouse event uses client coordinates.
